amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate with respect to pension reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 262 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 262 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2945; text: CR S2945) To express the sense of the Senate with respect to pension reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 262 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
